it: \nb[GUARDIA]Hey! E voi cosa ci fate qui???

en: \nb[\n[3]]That's what we should be asking you!
it: \nb[\n[3]]Dovremmo essere noi a farvi questa domanda!

en: Don't worry, we won't take our eyes off the \ni[15] ever again. We'll guard it day and night.
it: Tranquilli, ora non perderemo più d'occhio la \ni[15], la sorveglieremo giorno e notte.

en: \nb[\n[1]]I... don't think I've ever seen night fall around here.
Don't worry, we won't take our eyes off the \ni[15] ever again. We'll guard it constantly.
it: Tranquilli, ora non perderemo più d'occhio la \ni[15], la sorveglieremo continuamente.
